name: Moonguins
description:
A cool 2D beat 'em up set during the Cold War. Fight as either the 'Murican or Soviet proxy penguins in Antarctica. This game was made during the 2018 Game Marmalades at IGAD.

Credits

Producer:

  • Justin van Oort

Artists:

  • Bas Kessels
  • Tim Nijs

Designers:

  • Bas Sweere
  • Eric Drößiger

Programmers:

  • Filippo Denegri
  • Jasper Drescher
  • Niels Paardekooper
developers: IGAD Breda University of Applied Science
